data.eml:eml: Bryodiversity in the tropics: taxonomy of Microporella species (Bryozoa, Cheilostomata) with personate maternal zooids from Indian Ocean, Red Sea and southeast Mediterranean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Harmelin, Jean-Georges, Ostrovsky, Andrew N., Cáceres-Chamizo, Julia P., Sanner, Joann (2011): Bryodiversity in the tropics: taxonomy of Microporella species (Bryozoa, Cheilostomata) with personate maternal zooids from Indian Ocean, Red Sea and southeast Mediterranean. Zootaxa 2798: 1-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207232
